title: PDF Viewer for watsonx Assistant semantic search sources
documentationURL: This app provides the UI and backend for a PDF Viewer that can be used in combination with watsonx Assistant.
author: Diksha Chandra
description: Access to PDF URLs from Cloud Object Storage is only valid for 7200 seconds. To extend the visibility of these PDFs, you can use this PDF viewer. Deploy it on Code Engine to create persistent URLs for your Cloud Object Storage PDFs. This app provides the UI and backend for a PDF Viewer that can be used in combination with watsonx Assistant.
